name: Starvania: Action Platformer Prototype
description:
-INFO-

We at Paperi Games hope that you enjoy the game, we are happy to hear all of your feedback!

Controls:

W / Up Arrow = Look Up
A/ Left Arrow = Move Left
S/ Down Arrow = Look Down
D/ Right Arrow = Move Right
N/ Z = Attack
M/ X = Jump

Credits:

  • Music
